titleStmt.title: A True chronologi of all the kings of England from Brute, the first king vnto our most sacred King Charles mo[n]arke of ye whole yies.

notesStmt.note: Contains 147 numbered portraits (as well as unnumbered portraits of Henrietta Maria and Prince Charles).
Place and date of publication suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
